text: - Hello, I'm Josselin Vallee,
I work for Philip Morris International

as a manager for machine
integration and supervision.

So we have defined our success
in a very simple sentence.
"We want to transform manufacturing."
so how does AWS help us do that?
If you look at a factory,

80% of the data there is
generated by machines.
So if you want to be data-driven,
you need to be able to collect, analyze,

and take decision based
on this information.
And here, AWS is helping us a great deal

by offering us the
opportunity to co-develop
and create new services

that will enable our
business transformation.

What are the highlights
in working with AWS?
I think the people.

Whether you talk to a director
or a software developer,

you always find us, "Yes,
we can do" attitude.

You always find the way
to solve your issues,

solve your problems, and
it's really a pleasure
to work with such awesome people.
(bright upbeat music)
